title: Zombie Radio
description: Get your apocalypse on through the eyes and mouth of the DJ spinning your personal soundtrack to the end of the world. The novella inspired by the Zombie Radio podcast has finally arrived.This novella and the Zombie Radio podcast were based on the smash hit My Zombie My. Don't miss out on how Zombie Radio helped to save the planet from spiraling into the zombie abyss.
author: Jack Wallen
